section.name: ISmicro Commons Proximity
section.p: Proximity Webapp component is a J2EE Servlet deployment of Proximity.
PX Webapp is built upont Spring IoC and MVC implementation as a thin layer around PX Core. It consists of the controller classes and few Velocity templates.

subsection.name: Project reports
subsection.p: Navigate with links on the left to examine current project status, various project reports and latest changes.
